definition.name: NXstm
definition.doc: An application definition to describe Scanning Tunneling Microscopy (STM).

field.name: definition
field.doc: Name of the definition that is used for the STM technique.

field.name: scan_mode
field.doc: The mode of the scan that is performed. Two commonly used modes are constant height mode and constant current mode.

group.doc: The group explains the instrumentation of the STM experiment such as current sensor, lock-in amplifier etc.

group.name: lockin_amplifier
group.doc: The lock-in amplifier information. The device is being used to extract the very weak signal buried in noisy signals.

field.name: modulation_signal
field.doc: The type of the signal (voltage or current) subject fo modulation.

field.name: modulation_frequency
field.doc: The frequency of the sine modulation that is used to modulate the signal in lock-in.

group.name: scan_environment
group.doc: The environment information for stm or sts experiment.
The scan control information like scan region or phase space, e.g. pattern of scan (e.g. mesh, spiral, etc.), scanner speed, etc.

field.name: scan_type
field.doc: The type of scan like mesh, spiral, etc.

group.name: tip_temp_sensor
group.doc:
This group stands for the same concept as /ENTRY[entry]/INSTRUMENT[instrument]/tip_temp_sensor
Note: The group name written inside the square brackets (e.g. entry in ENTRY[entry]) would be the exact instance name of the base class (e.g. NXentry) in the nexus file.

Note: The group name written inside the square brackets (e.g. entry in ENTRY[entry]) would be the exact instance name of the base class (e.g. NXentry) in the nexus file.

group.name: tip_temp_sensor
group.doc: The temperature of the tip one of the tip.

group.name: cryo_temp_sensor
group.doc: The temperature of the cryostat.

group.name: cryo_shield_temp_sensor
group.doc: The temperature of the cryo shield.

group.name: current_sensor
group.doc: Current sensor for current between tip and sample.

field.name: current
field.doc: The tunneling current between tip and sample after applying bias voltage.

field.name: current_offset
field.doc: Offset value of the current measurement.

group.name: current_calibration
group.doc: Calibration of the current measurement.
An amplifier information for the input signal (e.g. from tip).

field.name: current_gain
field.doc: Proportional relationship between the probe output voltage and the actual tunneling current when measuring the tunneling current.

group.name: bias_spectroscopy_environment
group.doc: To explain bias (sweep measurement) voltage applied to the sample.
Setup and scan data for continuous measurement of bias-voltage on the subject of experiment vs tunneling current from probe.

group.name: piezo_sensor
group.doc: The sensor information for the piezo device.

group.name: piezo_configuration
group.doc: The piezo configuration information like piezoelectric device calibration and material properties.
The positioner information like the position of the tip, PID loop feedback etc.

group.name: z_controller
group.doc: The PID controller information for the z-axis.

group.name: reproducibility_indicators
group.doc: The group's concepts hold the link to the related concepts that define the reproducibility of the STM experiment.
